solution_line_template: Before the market opened, Paul sold {sold_to_neighbor} + {sold_at_gate} = <<{sold_to_neighbor}+{sold_at_gate}={total_sold_before_market}>>{total_sold_before_market} chickens
So he had {initial_chickens} - {total_sold_before_market} = <<{initial_chickens}-{total_sold_before_market}={chickens_left}>>{chickens_left} chickens left to sell at the market.
